issues.title: Login Page Error
issues.description: When I try to log in, I'm getting a '404 Page Not Found' error. This issue started occurring after the last update.

issues.title: Broken Image on Homepage
issues.description: The image on the homepage is not loading properly. It appears to be broken, and there's an 'Image Not Found' error.

issues.title: Dropdown Menu Bug
issues.description: There's a bug in the dropdown menu on the settings page. When I click on it, nothing happens, and I can't access the options

issues.title: Missing Contact Information
issues.description: I noticed that the contact information for our support team is missing from the 'Contact Us' page. It needs to be added as soon as possible.
